Race.SpecificTitle: Chief of Police -- Town of Lake Providence
PW Fantasy Sports -- Authorize Fantasy Sports Contests - Act 322, 2018
Race.SummaryText: PROPOSITION TO AUTHORIZE FANTASY SPORTS CONTESTS.
Race.FullText: Shall fantasy sports contests be permitted in the parish of East Carroll?

Race.SpecificTitle: PW Prop. No. 1 of 2 (Tourism Center) -- 1 Mill Renewal - PJ - 5 Yrs.
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish of East Carroll, State of Louisiana (the "Parish"), levy a special tax of one (1) mill on all the property subject to taxation in the Parish (an estimated $48,500 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of five (5) years, beginning with the year 2019 and ending with the year 2023, for the purpose of operating and maintaining the Byerley House (Tourism Center)?

Race.SpecificTitle: PW Prop. No. 2 of 2 (Cotton Museum) -- 2 Mills Renewal - PJ - 5 Yrs.
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish of East Carroll, State of Louisiana (the "Parish"), levy a special tax of two (2) mills on the property subject to taxation in the Parish (an estimated $97,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of five (5) years, beginning with the year 2019 and ending with the year 2023, for the purpose of operating and maintaining the Louisiana State Cotton Museum?

Race.SpecificTitle: Rural Fire Protection Dist. #1 -- 2.76 Mills Renewal - PJ - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Rural Fire Protection District #1 Proposition
(Millage Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall East Carroll Parish Rural Fire Protection District #1, State of Louisiana (the "District"), levy a two and seventy-six hundredths (2.76) mills tax on all the property subject to taxation in the District (an estimated $102,760 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2019 and ending with the year 2028, with the avails and proceeds of the tax to be used for the purpose of acquiring, constructing, improving, maintaining and operating fire protection facilities and equipment in and for the District?
